publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1393 Margaret Mitchell: Bank of Scotland Midnightleague-That the Parliament congratulates the Bank of Scotland on sponsoring the Midnightleague Initiative, which takes place on Fridays from early evening until midnight and provides qualified coaches in conjunction with the Scottish Football Association, local authorities and the police to run five and seven-a-side football teams for young people aged between 12 and 16; acknowledges the excellent progress that the league has made in encouraging young people to be interested in football and teaching them football skills, and welcomes the contribution the initiative has made to channelling young people's energies into positive pursuits and tackling youth crime.

S2M-1393 Bank of Scotland Midnightleague (lodged on 1 June 2004) Phil Gallie*, Murray Tosh*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Johnstone*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Rosie Kane*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Robert Brown*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Richard Lochhead*, Rob Gibson*, Shiona Baird*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, George Lyon*, Iain Smith*, Alex Neil*

S2M-1393 Margaret Mitchell: Bank of Scotland Midnightleague-That the Parliament congratulates the Bank of Scotland on sponsoring the Midnightleague Initiative, which takes place on Fridays from early evening until midnight and provides qualified coaches in conjunction with the Scottish Football Association, local authorities and the police to run five and seven-a-side football teams for young people aged between 12 and 16; acknowledges the excellent progress that the league has made in encouraging young people to be interested in football and teaching them football skills, and welcomes the contribution the initiative has made to channelling young people's energies into positive pursuits and tackling youth crime. Supported by: Phil Gallie, Murray Tosh, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Alex Johnstone, Mrs Nanette Milne, Mr David Davidson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Rosie Kane, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Robert Brown, Mike Pringle, Bill Aitken, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Richard Lochhead, Rob Gibson, Shiona Baird, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ms Sandra White, George Lyon, Iain Smith, Alex Neil, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1393 Bank of Scotland Midnightleague (lodged on 1 June 2004) Robin Harper*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1393 Bank of Scotland Midnightleague (lodged on 1 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1393 Bank of Scotland Midnightleague (lodged on 1 June 2004) Susan Deacon*
S2M-1393 Bank of Scotland Midnightleague (lodged on 1 June 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
